code: import{initializeApp}from"firebase/app";import{getAuth,onAuthStateChanged}from"firebase/auth";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";const firebaseConfig={apiKey:"AIzaSyB1GSHHUaBsfn9PtIiss8ihDb8N85hEzC4",authDomain:"ecomauth-d68fc.firebaseapp.com",projectId:"ecomauth-d68fc",storageBucket:"ecomauth-d68fc.appspot.com",messagingSenderId:"890678004532",appId:"1:890678004532:web:4a4100efde195de020b361",measurementId:"G-DPG875096K"};const app=initializeApp(firebaseConfig);const auth=getAuth();function UserAuth(){const[user,setUser]=useState();useEffect(()=>{let a=onAuthStateChanged(auth,user=>setUser(user));return a;},[]);return user;}export default UserAuth;
